description_localized.en: As the premier Italian hotel in New York City, our specialized concierge team is dedicated to ensure that your stay at our top NYC hotel is a memorable one. An urban oasis, this luxury hotel is blocks away from the city's famed Times Square, along with Radio City Music Hall, Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts and New York City's stunning Central Park. Our Concierge makes it easy to experience everything to the fullest.

description_localized.it: Essendo il primo hotel italiano a New York City, il nostro team di concierge specializzato è dedicato a garantire che il tuo soggiorno nel nostro hotel di New York sia memorabile. Un'oasi urbana, questo hotel di lusso si trova a pochi isolati dalla famosa Times Square della città, insieme a Radio City Music Hall, al Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts e allo splendido Central Park di New York City. Il nostro Concierge ti consente di sperimentare tutto al meglio.

more_content_localized.en:
At your service for any questions or requests, The Michelangelo Concierge can assist you with arrangements and/or suggestions for:

  • Transportation
  • Theater & Sport Activities
  • Sightseeing & Tours
  • Day Trips
  • Dining
  • Group accommodation requests

You can contact The Michelangelo concierge services by calling +1 212-261-8920 or emailing themichelangelo@cityexperts.com.

A member of our New York Concierge team will respond to your inquiry within 48 hours.

Please click the following link to learn more about some of our city’s most popular attractions and tours near our hotel and throughout our wonderful city: The Michelangelo - Concierge Service.
